description: List of resource drifts that were detected while running an assessment.

parameters.name: assessmentArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app-assessment/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Null, or the token from a previous call to get the next set of results.

nested_items.name: resourceDrifts
nested_items.description: Indicates all the resource drifts detected for an assessed entity.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application whose resources have drifted. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app-assessment/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: appVersion
nested_items.description: Version of the application whose resources have drifted.

nested_items.name: diffType
nested_items.description: Indicates if the resource was added or removed.

nested_items.name: referenceId
nested_items.description: Reference identifier of the resource drift.

nested_items.name: logicalResourceId
nested_items.description: Logical identifier of the drifted resource.

nested_items.name: eksSourceName
nested_items.description: Name of the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service cluster and namespace this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: logicalStackName
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudFormation stack this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: resourceGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource group that this resource belongs to.

nested_items.name: terraformSourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the Terraform S3 state file this resource belongs to.
